name: Purpose
text:
ARTICLE 10B
CREDIT LIFE INSURANCE
AND CREDIT DISABILITY INSURANCE

 §431:10B-101    The purpose of this article is to promote the public welfare by regulating credit life insurance and credit disability insurance.  Nothing in this article is intended to prohibit or discourage reasonable competition.  The provisions of this article shall be liberally construed. [L 1987, c 347, pt of §2]
